ValidationRule.description: Prevent any profile beside System Admin from change the Prospect-Client Number of a Current Client Integration Rule
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Administrator')), RecordType.Id <> '012500000000rIR', ISCHANGED(AccountNumber), NOT(ISNULL(PRIORVALUE(Bis_ID__c))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: **** This is an HRIS Integrated Record , the Prospect-Client Number can not be Modified
